name: Well Climb
description:
You and your sister are playing in the yard when you accidentally fall into the well. It is your goal to climb your way out of the well while dodging rats and bats out to eat at you. You only have your trusty yo-yo and water gun to defend yourself. (NOTE: You can wall climb which will be needed.)

Controls (Updated)

Arrow Keys/WASD - move, navigate menus

Enter/Left Click - accept (on menu), use weapon (left click only)

Backspace/Right Click - back (on menu), switch weapons (right click only)

Spacebar - Jump

Escape - pause/unpause
